net.hockeyapp.android

Class UpdateFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.app.DialogFragment
        • net.hockeyapp.android.UpdateFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, UpdateInfoListener

    public class UpdateFragment
extends android.app.DialogFragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, UpdateInfoListener

    Description

    Fragment to show update information and start the download process if the user taps the corresponding button.
